sentences.sContent: Is he a tall postman? Yes, he is.
sentences.sContent_eng: Is he a tall postman? Yes, he is.
sentences.sCn: 他是一个高的邮递员吗？是的，他是。

sentences.sContent: That tis my father. He is a postman. I love my father.
sentences.sContent_eng: That tis my father. He is a postman. I love my father.
sentences.sCn: 那是我的父亲。 阠他是一名邮递员。 我爱我的父亲。

remMethod.val: post(邮递)+man(人)→做邮递工作的人→邮递员

words.tran: 记录；[会计] 过帐；委派

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to collect and deliver letters
